description: Osamu is the father of Misa, Samatarou and Meme and husband to Venus. Osamu appears as an older man, who acts playful and appears to be a loving husband and father, albeit a somewhat odd one. When in his workplace in the heavens, Osamu`s main occupation appears to be the granting of human wishes. Because Osamu tends to go overboard when granting his son`s wishes, he frequently embarrassed his child.
name: Kamiyama Osamu
